original_text: Jesus replied, ‘Not everyone can agree with this idea. But God has helped some people to agree with it.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 사람마다 이 말을 받지 못하고 오직 타고난 자라야 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Not everyone can agree with this idea
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 이 생각에 동의할 수는 없다

sentences.original_text: But God has helped some people
